title: Vertical tabs, change in userChrome.css - (1) Reduce height (2) Remove borders
content:
Hi, I wanted to reduce height of tabs and remove borders in file userChrome.css.

So far this works for height, but was wanting to know if a negative value can be used to reduce further, Also tried some code to remove radius but it didn't work. Remove radius for selected tab and also hover on tab.

/* REDUCE HEIGHT OF TABS (VERTICAL TABS) */ .tabbrowser-tab { min-height: var(--tab-min-height) !important; max-height: var(--tab-min-height) !important; }
creator: moz_spt

title: Contact Number Not Visible on My Website in Firefox – Rama Rehab
content:
Hello Mozilla Support Team,

I’m facing an issue where the contact number on my website is not visible when viewed in Firefox, while it displays correctly in other browsers like Chrome, Safari, and Edge.

My business is called Rama Rehab, a Rehabilitation Centre in Delhi, and it's crucial for visitors to see our phone number for inquiries and bookings. The number is embedded in the site header/footer (or contact section), but for some reason, Firefox either hides it or fails to render it correctly.

Website: https://www.ramarehab.com/ What I’ve tried:

Cleared browser cache

Disabled all extensions

Checked in Private Window

Ensured number is not blocked by content settings

Still, the issue persists. Could this be related to content blocking, font issues, CSS rendering, or any privacy-related settings in Firefox?

Please help me understand what might be causing this and how to resolve it.

Thanks in advance, Rama Rehab
creator: roarwellnessrama
